name: La Candola

reviews.text: Chanced upon this place when looking to book a table for dinner, and ended up staying here for the best part of a week!
reviews.title: Just Perfect

likes.liked: — The owners, the rooms, the pool
likes.disliked: — Bit out the way - but on reflection that's probably a good thing too!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Recently acquired by the new owners, this place is the best place to stay for miles around. Great food, great hosts and staff, relaxed atmosphere and fantastic views make this a memorable pad to rest your head.
reviews.title: fake smile
Perfection
reviews.text: We had to tear ourselves away from here - can't wait to go back!

description: Welcome to the renewed country and charme Hotel "La Candola" of Soligo (Treviso) Italy. A prestigious address for the lovers of beautiful hilly landscapes, good Italian regional food and special Italian Prosecco wine. The locanda has six lovely and different furnished rooms and each one has the different name of flower. All rooms have private bathroom, with shower, hairdryer, bar, phone, colour Television, Internet connection, air conditioning and heating. Two rooms have a whirlpool.
